# Create a new repository

# Get the collaborators from the existing repository

collaborators_emails = collaborators_info.get("collaborators")

# Invite each collaborator to the new repository
for collaborator_email in collaborators_emails:
    git_invite_collaborators(repo_name=repo_name, collaborator_email=collaborator_email)
```
